content: to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 10 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 11 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 12 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 13 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 14 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 15 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 16 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 17 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round round 18 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 3 4 5 times p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * to end of round leg the ribbing will now change to a stockinette stitch the cable will continue down the front of the sock but the back will be knit in stockinette stitch work rnds 1-18 of leg pattern three times as follows round 1 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 2 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 3 knit 16 20 24 p2 c6b p2 knit to end of round round 4 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 5 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 6 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 7 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 8 knit 16 20 24 p2 c6b p2 knit to end of round round 9 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 10 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 11 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 12 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 13 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 14 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end of round round 16 knit 16 20 24 p2 k6 p2 knit to end
